{
    "sql": "CREATE TABLE t1 (c1 TINYINT); INSERT INTO t1 VALUES (-128); SELECT c1 FROM t1 WHERE CAST(POW(c1, c1) AS DECIMAL);",
    "Affected Elements": "CAST, POW",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The error arises from attempting to cast an extremely large decimal value generated by POW, which exceeds the allowable range for the DECIMAL data type."
}
